thread.title: Substitute Michael Anaba inspires Elche to vital win at Almeria in Spanish second-tier league
thread.title_full: Substitute Michael Anaba inspires Elche to vital win at Almeria in Spanish second-tier league

title: Substitute Michael Anaba inspires Elche to vital win at Almeria in Spanish second-tier league
text:
14:25 CET Substitute Michael Anaba inspires Elche to vital win at Almeria in Spanish second-tier league - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghanaian midfielder Michael Anaba was a second half substitute for Elche in their 3-2 win at Almeria in the Spanish top-flight on Sunday. 
The former Ghana youth international replaced Javier Espinosa in the second half as the visitors recorded the vital win at the Estadio de los Juegos MediterrÃ¡neos. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
